0.5.name: wordpress/gd-linkedin-badge
0.5.description:
This plugin adds simple widget that will display a badge with a description and a link to a LinkedIn public profile page. Plugin fully supports new Widget model introduced in WordPress 2.8 and allows multiple instances.

Includes several translations: English, Serbian, Lithuanian, French, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, Danish, German, Dutch, Norwegian. More details about translations in the languages.txt file.

Important URL's

Plugin Home | Forum | Feedburner | Twitter
